#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t, a, ans, k;
    long long int b;

    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--) {
            k = 0;
        scanf("%d", &a);
        scanf("%lld", &b);
        if (b == 0) k = 1;
        b = b % 4;
        if (b == 0) b = 4;
        a = a % 10;
        ans = 1;
        for (int i = 0; i < b; i++) {
            ans *= a;
            }
        ans %= 10;
        if (k == 1) ans = 1;
        printf("%d\n", ans);
        }
    return 0;
    }
